body_html:
Similar issue compiling:

  • Windows 10 Pro
  • VS 2017 compiler 14.15.26726
  • Windows SDK 10.0.17763.0
  • Cuda 10.0
  • Cudnn 7.3
  • Cuda Compute 7.5
  • Python 3.6.6
  • Bazel 0.17.2

Breaks the compilation, as shown below:


c:\users\joey\_bazel_joey\juz2ghmw\execroot\org_tensorflow\external\eigen_archive\eigen\src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(212): error: more than one instance of overloaded function "__hadd" matches the argument list:
            function "__hadd(int, int)"
            function "__hadd(__half, __half)"
            argument types are: (const Eigen::half, const Eigen::half)

@ruanjiandong Any updates?

@ruanjiandong Any updates?
body:
Similar issue compiling:

- Windows 10 Pro
- VS 2017 compiler 14.15.26726
- Windows SDK 10.0.17763.0
- Cuda 10.0
- Cudnn 7.3
- Cuda Compute 7.5
- Python 3.6.6
- Bazel 0.17.2

Breaks the compilation, as shown below:
```

c:\users\joey\_bazel_joey\juz2ghmw\execroot\org_tensorflow\external\eigen_archive\eigen\src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(212): error: more than one instance of overloaded function "__hadd" matches the argument list:
            function "__hadd(int, int)"
            function "__hadd(__half, __half)"
            argument types are: (const Eigen::half, const Eigen::half)
```

@ruanjiandong Any updates?
